Name: Pawan_Shrotria
Title: Sprawling Greenery
Review: Huge Park ! Very peaceful ! ... The park is located in remote Gomtinagar in Lucknow. PArk covers amazingly area of land with greenery allover. There is cememted large size water pond where one can have boating facility also after paying a reasonable amount. In the morning, there are people for morning walk and in the evening families are there to spend their evening with family members. There is one of tha largest flag of India which can be seen from kilometres.

Name: Khilesh C
Title: Best park in Lucknow
Review: It is a charmingly lovely park with so many fragrant flowers, trees and plenty of grass and a long walking track along the perimeter.  A small part of the area is also a synthetic track which is great for walkers and joggers. Size wise, Janeshwar Mishra park is larger but this park is more beautiful.

Name: bienu
Title: Lush Green Lohia Park in Lucknow
Review: Didn't expect it to be so big, green, neat and clean. If you love your morning walks, jogs or just be there, Lohia Park is a great place to be in. It is very natural with a variety of flora and fauna. I could see Kalp Vruksh also. Take out time to spend some quality time there, carry your laptop to record memories...

Name: amars777
Title: Beautiful park in the middle of city
Review: A huge park with variety of trees Located in the middle of city gives the citizens well deserved lung space. The park is very well maintained. Need more restaurants in the park.

Name: FANOUT
Title: Green Lungs
Review: A well laid out public space.....parking your car though is a bother..winters / spring(now) is  the best time to visit

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good
Review: One of the best place for leisure and to lose calories.A proper green space at the heart of the city. Very clean surroundings. Proper drinking water and clean toilet facilities built at regular intervals inside the park.Sitting benches available. Located at a proper location.

Name: SAURAV C
Title: Great place for those who wants to be refreshed in the Morning
Review: Great place for those who wants to be refreshed in the Morning. Be there to know what it means to wake up early morning. Good Place Good People with lots n lots of activity.

Name: 592abck
Title: What a park
Review: This is memorial park for a great leader. Neat and clean, maintained and not crowded. Parking could be an issue.

Name: Sudhir S
Title: A niceplace for morning walk
Review: A well layout park with multiple tracks for walking.There are 2 synthetic tracks a open jim and a number of activities for children.Park has number of trees including some rare trees like parijat .There are a numerous birds ducks etc.

Name: vsrinet
Title: Amazing Oasis of Greenery and Fresh Air
Review: This is a huge park ,situated centrally in Gomti Nagar,the poshest area of Lucknow.Very well connected and an excellent place for a peaceful walk,jog,meditation ,use of swings,by children and adults,alike.There is a vast variety of green trees,making it denay covered by green foliage,protecting the visitors from harsh sunlight,and providing much required fresh air.The park has sufficient security staff and the security is fool proof ,even after dusk.There are clean and well maintained wash rooms,unlike other parks.Processed water is also available.Children just love the swans in in the po d and the vintage railway steam engine on display.Strongly recommended  for park lovers.

Name: Amit M
Title: A good walk in green park
Review: The park is large enough and I enjoyed a good walk there in the lush green environment. Well maintained by the government with proper light and cleanliness.Avoid during day time in summers.

Name: Nandana1
Title: Peaceful Greenish Park
Review: Such a nice good park and can admire the greenish nature. Good for picnic with family or walk in the evening or morning. Well maintained. Very clean and neat.

Name: randhirt2017
Title: Good for exercise and walik
Review: Best place for couples not for family,enrty charge only 10 rs per head,you can reach easily from polytrchnic,please avoide day time,

Name: kalpajeetbhattachary
Title: This place is packed with beautiful greenery and the surroundings are so pleasant & quietness all around.
Review: This is a large park in Lucknow is named after - Dr.Ram Manohar Lohia who propagated Socialism. An awesome fountain show is displayed every evening. There are total four courtyards equipped with big parking spaces. All the entrances have ticket counters. This one is a great green area in the city of parks. This place is packed with beautiful greenery and the surroundings are so pleasant & quietness all around. There are two synthetic jogging tracks in the park. There is also a modern acupressure track near the entrance courtyard number two. This park is very well maintained by Lucknow Development Authority. This is the place where people enjoy the nature in it’s true colours.

Name: Ravi S
Title: The walking pathways and the synthetic jogging tracks are outstanding
Review: This is perhaps the only place in India in a city where you can enjoy the nature in its true colour!Very vast expansive and very nicely nurtured and maintained by Lucknow development Authority!All plants and trees are well selected and the aura inside the park is so quite and invigorating that one need to include in his/her itineary when you are in this city of nawabs !!

Name: neha763
Title: It offers beautiful green area
Review: This one is a great green area in the city of parks.  This place offers the beautiful green area and silent surrohnding which other parts lacks. It is pristine place. I just love this place.

Name: Aarav K
Title: Amazing
Review: Park is very green and beautiful. Ram manohar lohiya park is old but well maintained. Design of park is fantastic.

Name: Justin J
Title: Well maintained Park
Review: located in the heart of the city by the side of Gomti river ... Nice place to be with your companion ... Well designed and landscaped good greenery and lawns... You need to take ticket to visit the place

Name: Rajani B
Title: Watch out for the Fountain show
Review: This is a large park in the centre of the city named after the great leader of India - Dr.Ram Manohar Lohia who propagated Socialism.  The park is lush green and it's calm and peaceful place. There is a fountain show organised every evening which is simply awesome.
